des:
ADD VOICE CONTROL TO YOUR IOT DEVICES
This skill brings the voice control to your DIY microcontrollers. You can send voice commands to your relays, lights, switches, motors and view the live status of your devices directly in the Alexa app.

The free ChipChop device cloud is designed for hobbyists, artists, students, software developers or anyone who wants to bring IoT capabilities to their smart little gizmos.

HOW?
To use this skill you will need to get a free developer account on www.chipchop.io
The ChipChop device cloud provides a two-way communication with your microcontrollers enabling you to monitor and interact with your devices from anywhere in the world and in real-time! 
Upgrading your microcontrollers to a full IoT capable devices is a breeze using the ChipChop's simple API available as a free Arduino library and a feature rich fully interactive on-line development console.
By connecting this skill to your ChipChop cloud you will be instantly expanding your devices' capabilities to another level.

SUPPORTED BOARDS?
Pretty much anything that supports WebSocket connectivity, development boards like Arduino, ESP8266/ESP32, Espruino, Adafruit, Pi Picco and single board computers like Raspberry PI, BeagleBone, Jetson...
